mapper.select: SELECT * , CASE WHEN A.custNo = #{custNo} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ownerYn FROM ( SELECT ttp.trip_plan_no AS tripPlanNo , ttp.title AS title , ttp.start_dt AS startDt , ttp.end_dt AS endDt , ttp.thumbnail_img AS thumbnailImg , ttp.review AS review , ttp.public_yn AS publicYn , ttp.cust_no AS custNo FROM T_TRIP_PLAN ttp WHERE ttp.cust_no = #{custNo} AND ttp.start_dt BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} UNION ALL SELECT ttp2.trip_plan_no AS tripPlanNo , ttp2.title AS title , ttp2.start_dt AS startDt , ttp2.end_dt AS endDt , ttp2.thumbnail_img AS thumbnailImg , ttp2.review AS review , ttp2.public_yn AS publicYn , ttp2.cust_no AS custNo FROM T_TRIP_PLAN ttp2 INNER JOIN T_TRIP_MATE ttm ON ttm.trip_plan_no = ttp2.trip_plan_no WHERE ttm.cust_no = #{custNo} AND ttp2.start_dt BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} ) AS A ORDER BY A.startDt DESC

SELECT ttp.trip_plan_no AS tripPlanNo , ttp.title AS title , ttp.start_dt AS startDt , ttp.end_dt AS endDt , ttp.thumbnail_img AS thumbnailImg , ttp.review AS review , ttp.public_yn AS publicYn , ttp.cust_no AS custNo FROM T_TRIP_PLAN ttp WHERE trip_plan_no = #{tripPlanNo}
SELECT ttm.trip_mate_no AS tripMateNo , ttm.trip_plan_no AS tripPlanNo , ttm.cust_no AS cust_no FROM T_TRIP_MATE ttm WHERE trip_plan_no = #{tripPlanNo}

SELECT ttd.trip_detail_no AS tripDetailNo , ttd.trip_plan_no AS tripPlanNo , ttd.plan_dt AS planDt , ttd.seq AS seq , ttd.contentid AS contentid , ttd.content_type_id AS contentTypeId , ttd.title AS title , ttd.address AS address , ttd.mapx AS mapx , ttd.mapy AS mapy , tpr.place_review_no AS placeReviewNo , tpr.cust_no AS custNo , tpr.star AS star , tpr.review AS review , tpr.review_img1 AS reviewImg1 , tpr.review_img2 AS reviewImg2 , tpr.review_img3 AS reviewImg3 FROM T_TRIP_DETAIL ttd LEFT OUTER JOIN T_PLACE_REVIEW tpr ON ttd.trip_detail_no = tpr.trip_detail_no WHERE ttd.trip_plan_no = #{tripPlanNo}

SELECT tpr.place_review_no AS placeReviewNo , tpr.star AS star , tpr.cust_no AS custNo , tpr.contentid AS contentid , tpr.review AS review , tpr.review_img1 AS reviewImage1 , tpr.review_img2 AS reviewImage2 , tpr.review_img3 AS reviewImage3 , tpr.review_img4 AS reviewImage4 , tc.nickname AS nickName FROM T_PLACE_REVIEW tpr INNER JOIN T_CUST tc ON tc.cust_no = tpr.cust_no WHERE tpr.contentid = #{contentid} ORDER BY tpr.place_review_no DESC
